title: Cook's Club El Gouna LPC 2023
offer_address: El Gouna Downtown, El Gouna, 84513, Egypt

title: Adults-Only Red Sea Beachfront Splendour near Hurghada with Private Beach & Spa
description:
Nestled along the shimmering Red Sea, this adults-only oasis is a bohemian dream come true. With its minimalist design, world-class spa and private swim-up pools, you'll feel like you've stumbled into a celebrity's secret hideaway. The Kitchen Club serves up mouthwatering local flavours, while the poolside bar is the perfect spot to sip cocktails and watch the sunset.

Tucked away in El Gouna, Egypt's premier resort town, this desert retreat offers the best of both worlds. You're just steps from pristine Buzzha Beach's crystal-clear waters, yet a stone's throw from the Abu Tig Marina and its trendy shops, bars and eateries. Whether you're looking to kitesurf, explore ancient wonders, or lounge by the pool, paradise is at your fingertips.
offer_address: Kite Center Road, Hurghada, El Gouna 84513, Egypt
